You could say our style is Southern with swagger, but we just call it fun. Leave the ordinary behind and step into a Treylor Park restaurant. Our Story Shop Our Get Your Swag On Let‚Äôs Get This Party Started Every Wednesday  at Treylor Park St. Augustine Bingo Night at TP St. Augustine View Event Friday, August 22, 2025 Fourth Annual  TP  Open View Event Every Tuesday  at Pizza Party Trivia Night at Pizza Party View Event Every Thursday  at Treylor Park Nocatee Ladies Night at TP Nocatee View Event VIEW MORE EVENTS Sign up for our newsletter to get the latest on food, fun and events at your local Treylor Park restaurant. Sign Up for the TP Mix Tape You're Making Us Blush The flavor profiles here are incredible. They serve ordinary sounding fare but with a superlative twist. Unusual flavors bring new respect to classic dishes. Country fried steak and gravy on a biscuit was stellar ‚Äì they added just a little something different. The low country skillet was amazing. Portions were generous and there were no complaints from our party of 7. This place deserves to be packed out regularly. Randy D. on Google Visited Double Wide Diner The service was quick and the food is very fresh. We got a veggie pizza and all of the toppings looked to be hand cut. Nothing frozen. I would have to say this is one of the best pizzas I‚Äôve eaten anywhere. 2 people almost got through a large. I will definitely be back the next time I‚Äôm in town. B P on Google Visited Pizza Party Literally blown away. Service was a 10 and it wasn‚Äôt very busy. Had the chicken and waffles and it was amazing. Waffle was sweet and buttery. Chicken was crisp and warm. They had this pecan syrup which was super sweet but delicious. Tbh the waffles didn‚Äôt even need it. I felt like the Mac and cheese was mid but it didn‚Äôt take anything away from the great meal. 9.5/10 Husain A. on Google Visited Hitch This was a great late night find for us! ‚Ä¶.The Treylor Park was open with a couple of locations nearby, so we headed in. We ordered the Treylor park nachos and the pancake taco with fresh strawberry salsa and the combinations of ingredients were tasty and amazing! ‚Ä¶.And our server was also awesome! We were looking for a quick bite, but ended up finding a real gem. Highly recommend! Marilyn S. on Yelp Visited Hitch Best of the Treylor Park establishments as far as menu goes. Appetizers are far better than any other pizza joint! Karston B. on Yelp Visited Pizza Party *These reviews are from actual customers and reflect their individual experiences. No compensation was provided for these or any other testimonials. Tag Us on Social Catch every play on the big screen this weekend and enjoy our gameday specials. Good food, cold drinks, and all the action. Bring your crew! *Only at Pizza Party 6 3 Open Your newest hyper fixation meal?
